items.headline: Learn to relax and be calm instantly using powerful and simple NLP techniques which will help you release stress .

In this course you will learn very powerful techniques of NLP which will help you calm your mind and release any kind of work related and personal stress and tension in your mind

Optimizing your mindset and mental health to not let this person affect you

items.title: Beat Stress & Anxiety! Live Your Best Life Now!
items.headline: Helping you to understand, recognize and deal with the stress and anxiety in your life!
objectives_summary: 1. Students will learn to understand, recognize and DEAL with stress and anxiety.
2. Students will understand the difference between fear, anxiety and stress.
3. Students will discover what best works for them in managing their stress!

items.title: Emotional Regulation 101
items.headline: Learn How to Stay Cool so You Don't Pop!
objectives_summary: You feel more control over your emotions and can identify your triggers and pause before you respond.
